description: Returns a list of registries that you have created, with minimal registry information. Registries in the Deleting status will not be included in the results. Empty results will be returned if there are no registries available.

nested_items.name: Registries
nested_items.description: An array of RegistryDetailedListItem objects containing minimal details of each registry.

nested_items.name: RegistryArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the registry.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The data the registry was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date the registry was updated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token for paginating the returned list of tokens, returned if the current segment of the list is not the last.
